entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: SW 60 km/h gust 83 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
